Header: Fire in Dematagoda damages three houses
Content: Colombo (News1st):Â The fire that erupted at the 85th Watta in Dematagoda this afternoon has been completely doused. The Fire Brigade noted that the fire which erupted around 12.17 PM damaged 3 houses. The Fire Brigade noted that three Service vehicles were dispatched to douse the fire. The cause of the fire is not yet ascertained.
